'''Kemal Amin "Casey" Kasem''' ([[27 April|April 27]], [[1932]] - [[15 June|June 15]], [[2014]]<ref>http://www.tmz.com/2014/06/15/casey-kasem-dead-dies-radio/</ref>), played [[Meriadoc Brandybuck|Merry]] in [[The Return of the King (1980 film)]]. Kasem, a renowned voice actor, is perhaps best known as [[wikipedia:Shaggy Rogers|Shaggy]] in ''Scooby Doo''.
